## FlowBatch class

Represents a batch of flow operations that are applied sequentially and atomically.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @sealed */
export declare class FlowBatch extends BASE implements Readonly<FlowBatchProps> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> BASE

<b>Implements:</b> Readonly&lt;[FlowBatchProps](./scribing.flowbatchprops.md)<!-- -->&gt;

|  [afterRemoval(other)](./scribing.flowbatch.afterremoval.md) |  |  |

|  [transform(other)](./scribing.flowbatch.transform.md) |  | Transforms the specified operation to with respect to change implied by the current operation so that the intent of the operation is retained when it is applied after the current operation. |
